title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2017 Lealana 1.0 / 0.5 XMR brass/nickel set #35, ICG MS69 x4STARTING BID: 0.0180BTCLOT 2: 2016 Lealana 5 XMR brass coin #405, ICG MS67STARTING BID: 0.0300BTCLOT 3: 2017 Satori Post Fork chips x53682036822368283683236845STARTING BID PER CHIP: 0.0010BTC*Lot 3 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctionsSTARTING BID PER LOT PER COIN: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT PER COIN: 0.0002BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: APRIL 12th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED

comments.author: Kryptowerk
comments.body: Lot 3, 3@ 0.002Question regarding lot1: How many of these sets do exist?It's been a while, how many of these sets were produced? (got 200 in mind but not sure)
